publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-883 Mr Gil Paterson: Use of National Stadium for Mike Tyson Fight—That the Parliament notes that the National Stadium, funded by public money, is to be used as the venue for the controversial Mike Tyson fight; further notes that as the Scottish Football Association has been gifted custodianship of Scotland’s national stadium it has a responsibility to the Scottish public to act as a good gatekeeper; believes that it has failed badly in this task by allowing the National Stadium to be used as a venue for this event, and calls for the Association urgently to reconsider this decision taking into account the opinions of the people of Scotland as reflected by the Parliament.

S1M-883 Use of National Stadium for Mike Tyson Fight (lodged on 19 May 2000) Fiona McLeod*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Shona Robison*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Tricia Marwick*, Christine Grahame*, Alex Neil*
S1M-883 Use of National Stadium for Mike Tyson Fight (lodged on 19 May 2000) Colin Campbell*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-883 Use of National Stadium for Mike Tyson Fight (lodged on 19 May 2000) Fergus Ewing*, Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-883 Mr Gil Paterson: Use of National Stadium for Mike Tyson Fight—That the Parliament notes that the National Stadium, funded by public money, is to be used as the venue for the controversial Mike Tyson fight; further notes that as the Scottish Football Association has been gifted custodianship of Scotland’s national stadium it has a responsibility to the Scottish public to act as a good gatekeeper; believes that it has failed badly in this task by allowing the National Stadium to be used as a venue for this event, and calls for the Association urgently to reconsider this decision taking into account the opinions of the people of Scotland as reflected by the Parliament. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Shona Robison, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Christine Grahame, Alex Neil, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe, Michael Russell*
S1M-883 Use of National Stadium for Mike Tyson Fight (lodged on 19 May 2000) Donald Gorrie*, Ms Sandra White*, Linda Fabiani*, Andrew Wilson*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-883 Use of National Stadium for Mike Tyson Fight (lodged on 19 May 2000) Mr John Swinney*

S1M-883 Use of National Stadium for Mike Tyson Fight (lodged on 19 May 2000) Mr Gil Paterson*
